oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oswald Shubert
Shubert, Oswald, portrait photograph
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of a young man in Union uniform with short, single-breasted jacket, standing next to a small table and resting his left hand on a bugle.
Oswald Shubert posed with his bugle for this formal portrait.
